Chengliang Wu: Thai cooking oil shortage reflects the joint

Since late last year, the market appears rare in Thailand waste cooking oil. Some large supermarket chains in Bangkok, the edible oil imports on the shelves in addition to olive oil, the local people rare sight of palm oil used cooking oil, rapeseed oil, Christian Louboutin Sale,soybean oil has been largely out of stock. On the black market, the price of 1 liter of palm oil has risen more than 70 baht (1 U.S. dollar equals 30 baht), up nearly a month ago, more than doubled.

Thailand is second only to Indonesia and Malaysia, the world's third largest producer of palm oil, palm oil shortage why it? Late last year, the event in Thailand floods, palm oil production decline, but this time the international market, palm oil prices. The Thai government announced that the official price per liter of palm oil to 38 baht from the original to increase to 47 baht. To price increases not only failed to inhibit the social demand, but increasing oil shortage on the market: on the one hand, merchants said the baht rise 9 international market prices did not keep pace; the other hand,Christian Louboutin Sandals, one for palm oil prices, prompting a large forced the government through the accumulation of oil price increases business.

In addition, Christian Louboutin Boots,palm oil is bio-energy, thus creating a car with people competing for oil. International crude oil prices in recent years,christian louboutin pumps, the Thai government attention to bio-energy. From June 1, 2010, the Thai began to force the use of palm oil mixed with 2% B3 biodiesel, currently plans to gradually transition to the use of 5% palm oil mixed with diesel. Experts estimate that over the three into a Thai palm oil has been used for bio-diesel. It stands to reason, Christian Louboutin Evening,Thailand, the shortage of palm oil imports from the international market can be adjusted. But when the Thai government has decided to urgently import palm oil, Christian Louboutin Online,the other palm oil producing countries have to ensure that domestic demand in Indonesia, so that palm oil export tariffs soaring with the price increase. More importantly, due to import a longer period, the Thai market on the palm oil supply situation is yet to be fundamentally alleviated.

Some experts have likened to a shallow grain market chassis, said plate is large, but shallow end of the supply a bit more to overflowing, they obviously feel a little less inadequate. This feature shows the vulnerability of the grain market.

There are many examples of the same. Limit the export of wheat last year, gave Russia the international market has brought a shock effect. Again, due to higher overall price level in Thailand, Thai rice farmers planted recently asked the Government to guarantee the purchase price of rice by a 1 million baht per tonne to 1.4 million baht. Thailand is one of the world's major rice exporting countries, if the rice price increases, world grain market will be affected, while the dependence on imported rice in the Philippines and Indonesia, the country's food security will also be affected.

Food security issues in the linkage effects between different countries is growing, the adjustment of a country's food policy in other countries often will affect the international market. Numerous examples show that the foundation of food security is to have a sound and stable food production and supply system.

Spain L'Oreal and Procter & Gamble and other 8 companie

AP Spanish National Competition Commission to fix prices on the grounds that the French company L'Oreal, Christian Louboutin Sale,Procter & Gamble and many other cosmetics manufacturers impose a total of 50 million euros (about 69.8 million U.S. dollars) fine.

Survey shows that eight companies in 1989 to 2008 in the Spanish market for hair products, a common pricing practice and hinder competition in the European market.

The companies involved,Christian Louboutin Sandals, including the world's largest manufacturer of beauty products company L'Oreal in France, the United States cosmetic giant Procter & Gamble, Henkel, Germany and other enterprises of the branch in Spain, occupying a total area of Spain, shampoo and hair care products market share of 70% .

Survey, these companies once every six months will be to discuss and develop product prices and other corporate strategies.

L'Oreal Company fined the maximum amount of the Spanish branch for 23.2 million euros (3239 million). Christian Louboutin Boots.

Being punished in Spain, P & G spokesman Paul Fox said: "We are evaluating the details of this decision. However, since 2008, we have access to relevant survey every quarter, has been reserved for the corresponding (fine) funds. "

Procter & Gamble fined the Spanish branch of this 12 million euros (1675 million). However, according to the European "Weekly News" Web site disclosure of data, P & G set aside 5.75 billion dollars,christian louboutin pumps, for the response to the European anti-trust authorities may impose a fine on the grounds.

Procter & Gamble in Europe by the anti-monopoly investigation, investigative bodies, including Spain, the European Commission and the management in 10 countries. Many antitrust experts say the case, Procter & Gamble set aside funds for such a huge response to the potential fine, people can not help but speculate whether this giant on the extent to which participation of the industry "conspiracy."

January 19 morning, Chinese President Hu Jintao paid a state visit on the occasion of the United States, Christian Louboutin Sale,the United States, "First Lady" Michelle Obama in Washington, delivered a speech on Sino-US educational exchanges. She announced that to achieve 4 million years, China has sent students to the goal, now raised $ 22,500,000 from the amount of business to subsidize more Americans to China to study. China news agency, Washington, March 7 - American political figure who is most popular? 7, released a poll answer: First Lady Michelle Obama.

According to the Quinnipiac University (Quinnipiac University) 7 release of "National Thermometer poll" results in 23 major U.S.Christian Louboutin Sandals. political figures, the first lady to champion the maximum temperature of 60.1 degrees, become the most Welcome to the American political figure.

Second to fourth in order, are: former President Bill Clinton, New Jersey Governor Christie, the current President Obama.

Americans, like Obama's charisma, but did not like his policies. The polls show the public heat for Obama is 56.5 degrees.

Pollsters said Brown, 74% of the respondents like Obama, but only 42% of the people like his policies, Christian Louboutin Boots,the problem is that he seeks re-election in the end is which factors will dominate. Election experts say there is no doubt that Obama wants a smooth election, we must further improve the U.S. economy and employment.

Several are listed in the 2012 polls could challenge Obama Republicans, christian louboutin pumps,former Arkansas Mike Huckabee, former Massachusetts Governor Mitt Romney and former Minnesota governor Bao Lundi heat breakdown of the popularity of the sixth, eighth and IX.

The lowest temperature, the most unpopular political figures were as follows: House Minority Leader Nancy Pelosi,Christian Louboutin Evening, Senate Majority Leader Harry Reid, by the "tea party" reputation the former Alaskan resurgence. President George W. Bush and others interested in the first election in 2012 House Speaker Gingrich is also on the list.

This poll is the last week of February 1887 for registered voters nationwide, the margin of error of plus or minus 2.3%. Christian Louboutin Online.

It is estimated that over the past 5 years has been highest in the forefront of the Mexican telecommunications major Hengstenberg Lim, "Warren" Buffett and Microsoft founder Bill Gates, this year will continue to be ranked 1-3. Slim assets of 53.5 billion U.S. dollars last year, Christian Louboutin Boots,crowding out by a minimum of 5 billion Gaici Deng on the list, which is the second time since 1995, lost the richest man title. Lincoln estimated that Gates, Buffett and Slim are a net worth of 490 billion dollars, 47 billion U.S. dollars and 600 billion dollars.

The nation's largest "Bill and Melinda Gates Foundation," christian louboutin pumps,focused on global health and development and U.S. education, the Bill and Melinda Gates has so far donated 28 billion U.S. dollars to the Foundation.

Slim has said that businesses with "play Santa" (charity), it would be better to promote employment through investment and social wealth. Although he pledged to give away billions to charity, but in comparison with Bill Gates, Christian Louboutin Evening,still pale into insignificance. Japanese Prime Minister show support for the decision slight

Japan's coastal waters on March 11 earthquake, the capital of Tokyo felt strong. Christian Louboutin Sale.Japan Meteorological Agency immediately issued a tsunami warning, said the earthquake will lead to about 6 meters high tsunami. The picture shows the scene at the Tokyo meeting of the House of Lords Committee, Japan's Prime Minister Naoto Kan felt the quake.

BEIJING, March 13 Xinhua in a 140 years to the most serious earthquake, so that the phase of temporary Kan no fear.

According to Japan's Jiji news agency reported that 24 hours after the earthquake, Naoto Kan in the polls, Christian Louboutin Sandals,"stabilized rebound", although the percentage increase by only 1.1%.

Reported that the Kan last month against the rates fell by 0.8% to 62.9%.

Just a few days before the earthquake, an event made political contributions of foreigners living in Japan public support ratings have fallen below 20% Kan face many a crisis of confidence. Naoto Kan is considered to be the central figure of the foreign minister regime Maehara 6th of this month to accept illegal political funds for his resignation. Christian Louboutin Boots.Maehara Kan this year became the second cabinet reshuffle in January after the first cabinet minister to resign.

Analysts generally believe that in the absence of this sudden disaster, the prime minister Kan crumbling. When a huge disaster strikes,christian louboutin pumps, people most in need of a stable and powerful than the government and leadership.

Over the past 24 hours, Naoto Kan frequently televised speech, reporting progress in disaster relief, to appease public sentiment. 12 early in the morning, dressed in blue work clothes Kan, Christian Louboutin Evening,Fukushima helicopter to the hardest hit, Miyagi counties inspect the disaster. He visited the emergency core cooling system abnormality first nuclear power plant in Fukushima Tokyo Electric Power Company, and from the aerial inspection severe earthquake and tsunami disaster in coastal counties.

Experts point out that Naoto Kan in the performance of the relief process to determine whether his political future, Christian Louboutin Online,"turned the corner."

Fukushima nuclear power plant at Three units first explosion

BEIJING, March 14 Xinhua, "Central News" reported that Tokyo Electric Power Company first nuclear power plant in Fukushima III machine,Christian Louboutin Sale, possible part of the fuel rods melted reactor core meltdown risk, the implementation will be the morning of 14 into the water cooling operation.

METI Nuclear Safety Security Court pointed out that the Unit 1 reactor building as an explosion-like danger in the continued existence of Unit 3, Tokyo Electric Power, etc. are reviewing the safety of the method of hydrogen extraction.

Security Court noted that the Unit 3 cooling water level gauge shows the fuel rods are about 2.2 meters was exposed state, Christian Louboutin Sandals,but since the fire because of the continuing use of pipe into the water, the reactor pressure remained stable. The amount of radiation per hour, around, are more at 13:52 on the 13th of the peak value of 1557.5 micro West greatly reduced, Christian Louboutin Boots,"full of contradictions."

This may be the water level gauge failure. If the fuel rods continued strong showing, the package review zirconium alloy fuel temperature, the reaction with water will produce hydrogen. christian louboutin pumps.If this hydrogen leakage to the reactor building, and the reaction of oxygen in the air, there is danger of causing an explosion.

Security Institute and the Tokyo Electric Power which was busy using sea water cooling the fuel rods in order to reduce the number of hydrogen and a review of the reactor containment extraction method for hydrogen accumulation. Allegedly because of the danger of explosion reactor,Christian Louboutin Evening, the operator can not close, continue to produce hydrogen is also unknown.

Security Institute and other pointed out that even in the event like a No. 1 machine-like hydrogen explosion outside containment of fuel rods and no danger of injury, so the existing residents within 20 km radius of the refuge's instructions,Christian Louboutin Online, without the need to expand

U.S. daylight saving time into the iPhone ahead of standard

United States from the local time at 2:00 on March 13 from access to daylight savings time,Christian Louboutin Sale, will be one hour ahead of standard time. The day of many iPhone users complain that their phone time to the confusion.

The U.S. daylight savings time from the year the second Sunday in March until the first Sunday in November end, this time the time difference between China and the United States, 13 hours from the time of winter into 12 hours.Christian Louboutin Sandals. Part of the iPhone users in the Twitter and blog on Sunday, said on their mobile phones "forgotten" by the daylight saving time in the same day transferred to the function, resulting in missed alarm clock rang late to go to church time. Some users said their mobile phone time, but adjusted for an hour, Christian Louboutin Boots,resulting in display of the time slower than the actual time of two hours.

In addition, states decide whether to adopt daylight savings time, such as Arizona and Hawaii and other places do not need to adjust the time, but some of these areas, said iPhone users, their phones automatically adjust to the daylight saving time, christian louboutin pumps,triggering a series of confusion.

Currently affected iPhone users have two ways to adjust the daylight saving time clock, first shut down or reset the phone, or tune into the phone and then swapped back to airplane mode.Christian Louboutin Evening.

Apple set the problem of the time the turn of last season to have occurred. January 1 this year, and January 2 for two days, iPhone cell phone that have occurred "door alarm", if the user's alarm clock is set to single, it will ring the alarm when the failure, Christian Louboutin Online,but the user can adjust iPhone built-in clock time to solve this problem

U.S. astronauts from the space station fares rose an average

February 26, 2011, U.S. Eastern time 14:14,Christian Louboutin Sale, "Discovery" space shuttle is docked with the International Space Station.
WASHINGTON, March 14 (Xinhua Ren Haijun) 14, NASA said in a statement, the council has signed with the Russian Federal Space Agency total of 7.53 million contract, which will be in 2014 June 2016 delivery of 12 U.S. Christian Louboutin Sandals,astronauts to and from the international space station. This also means that every American astronauts to and from the station's average fare rose to $ 62,750,000.
Last year, NASA and the Russian Federal Space Agency signed 335 million contract,Christian Louboutin Boots, was determined for each American astronaut from 2013 to 2014 and from the station's fare is $ 55,800,000. The current fare is approximately $ 51,000,000. NASA said that rising inflation is the main reason for the fare.christian louboutin pumps.
NASA said in a statement called on the Secretary Bolden, the United States as soon as commercial enterprises and from the space station astronauts take on the task of transporting. NASA budget request for fiscal year 2012, including 700 million U.S.Christian Louboutin Evening, dollars to stimulate commercial enterprises in developing manned spacecraft funds.
U.S. space shuttle will be retired this year. Since then, U.S. astronauts will rely on Russian spacecraft to the space station,Christian Louboutin Online. Cargo resupply the space station by two commercial companies and the United States, Russia, Europe, Japan is responsible.

U.S. Congress to approve the temporary suspension of the Oba

China news agency, Washington, March 17 (Reporter Yongjian De) - 17, following the House of Representatives United States Senate after the adoption of a scheduled April 8 due to the temporary budget resolution,Christian Louboutin Sale, so that the Obama administration from the 18 "closed down. "

Mid-term elections last November, the Republican-dominated House of Representatives budget for fiscal year 2011 dragged on without resolution, the administration has been relying on temporary budget to maintain the operation. Provisional budget for 18 full maturity, such as the Congress does not extend, Obama can only "close."

17 to 87:13 of the Senate agreed to vote the provisional budget until April 8,Christian Louboutin Sandals, has taken the lead with 16 at the House of Representatives approved the resolution, Obama 18, "close" to stay in fear.

The day of the Democratic Party dominated the Senate voted to adopt the provisional budget resolution in addition, also approved a total value of $ 6,000,000,000 the latest in cutting government spending programs, while Republicans in the House of Representatives last month passed a resolution in mid-planned for fiscal year 2011,Christian Louboutin Boots, reduction of the remaining 7 months 61 billion U.S. dollars cost difference between the two parties and cut more than 500 billion dollars plan.

Substantial cuts in government spending by the Republican Party's "super-plan", the trigger fierce rally Obama, once the Senate threatened that he would not hesitate to use presidential veto,christian louboutin pumps, after a quarrel between the two parties so that the federal government "business" of the risk of surface .

Earlier this month, in the compromise negotiations, Congress agreed to maintain the federal government was running a temporary budget extension of two weeks due to the March 18, 17 approved the extension period is three weeks,Christian Louboutin Evening, more than a week, week increase in the number seems to imply that Mr Obama and the progress of negotiations.

After the Senate vote, White House spokesman Jay Carney said in a statement,Christian Louboutin Online, Obama in three weeks an agreement with Congress to cut spending, "optimistic", but given the current Democratic and Republican has up to 500 billion U.S. dollars of the "differences" over Mr Obama has sent the government three weeks can completely remove the "close" the worry is still unknown.

Haiti's exiled former president returned to the airport to

Haiti's exiled former president Jean - Bertrand Aristide, 18, arrived in the Haitian capital Port au Prince the morning, at the airport by thousands of people welcomed.

Popular

18, 9 am, ride Aristide's private plane landed in Port au Prince International Airport.

Aristide,Christian Louboutin Sale, a dark suit, red and blue striped tie lines, accompanied by his family and the media down the ramp, a smile to greet his supporters waved.

"If you lean upon my chest hear my heart pounding, singing melodies to Haiti."

About 3,000 supporters gathered outside the airport, or hand-held banners, or holding Aristide head, or Flags are flown, or shouting slogans to welcome the end of his exile, returned to Haiti.

DPA description, and the atmosphere warm, as a grand festival.

United Nations peacekeeping force in Haiti and the Haitian police personnel deployed at the airport,Christian Louboutin Sandals, just in case.

Fox Aristide party affiliation, "the Lavalas family" members. Standing in the crowd, he told Reuters: "The people of Haiti, this is an important day."

Calls inclusive

Aristide made a brief speech at the airport. He told reporters the hope that the "return" to turn over a new chapter in Haiti's testimony.

"Brothers and sisters, (my exile) in the past 7 years, we communicate far. Now,Christian Louboutin Boots, we are the same in the country, (we) work every day to bring it peace."

Aristide called on Haitian authorities to be more inclusive. According to his view, education can help achieve this goal.

He said that the Haitian authorities to prohibit "the Lavalas family" candidates nominated presidential election. This is an exclusion, "as the cut branches to sit under the body of the Okanagan."

The Associated Press said that Aristide This argument seems to conflict with the previous position.

Aristide said earlier, christian louboutin pumps,no intention to return to political disturbance, the election, will join the education.

On the reconstruction of

Aristide said that, when he left in 2004 compared to today's experience of the earthquake hit Haiti, devastated,Christian Louboutin Evening, "pressure in the 27 million tons under the rubble," a long hard road reconstruction.

According to his argument, he will post-disaster reconstruction "to do a small contribution." However, he did not explain the specific content of contributions.

U.S. worried about Aristide of Haiti in the March 20 presidential election second round of voting before the return could cause political instability, affect the election results, the previous pressure several times, trying to prevent the latter return to action.

U.S. Ambassador to Haiti 18 published later in the microblogging message that the United States that Aristide have the right to return to their country. "But he will decide (what to do), if he wants to play an active role in Haiti in the future."

Gerard Pierre lawyer said Aristide high political prestige, Christian Louboutin Online,access to broad public support, have the ability to force the joint parties, "he is the only to bring unity and dignity of the Haitian people."

Aristide left the airport, drive home, on the road given a warm welcome by many supporters.

Later, thousands of supporters gathered outside his house, but no further speech Aristide.

louboutin-pumps-c-3.html">christian louboutin pumps</a>, the Indian technology magnate Li Muji (Azim Premji) has donated $ 2,000,000,000 for the development of Indian

British police raided the three girls started crying, said t

British police raid to arrest defloration girls in the park

3 girls holding 20 terror daffodils burst into tears; Police said the park was private property and theft defloration

If one drug or robbery in the park attack, the police will certainly rush to catch. Now, however, Christian Louboutin Sale,if the park in the UK picked flowers may also enjoy such "treatment." 16 According to media reports, three less than 10-year-old British girl has nearly been arrested by the police simply because they pick daffodils in the park.

Two police raids

The three little girls are 4-year-old Sienna, 6-year-old Olivia and less than 10-year-old Yin Diya.

Sunday (13 days) in the afternoon, they came to Britain with his parents in a park to play Poole. In the meantime,Christian Louboutin Sandals, the three little girls by two police officers inadvertently stared at 20 minutes long, but also received a warning that will be taken to the police station, police this "threat" to their frightened cry randomly together.

It turned out that when children see the daffodils bloom in the park but could not help but want to pick several flower nice when it happens to be a man named Mr Peter Adams saw that he immediately call the police call about the matter,Christian Louboutin Boots, hope the police to the former to deal with.

Even more unexpected is that police in the received "report" real consequences of a police car and two out of the police, who rushed to the scene.

Mother of the child angry protests

It is reported that two police officers first, "hidden" in the police monitoring the little girls in the move, christian louboutin pumps,and finally came up sharply criticized. Police said they saw the children hold hands about 20 daffodils.

The girls mother, 35-year-old Ellington said, the police said they committed a crime, said the children will kindly put a horse. But if they do not leave immediately, it will immediately be arrested. "It was so incredible,Christian Louboutin Evening, my children were scared to cry, and Siena are afraid to go to the park until now."

Poole police, said the park because this is all Mr Bide Ya Adams, so the park is also part of his personal Flowers, "defloration means guilty of theft, we can to prosecute this offense."

"If I see my children picked flowers,Christian Louboutin Online, I will stop at the former patient persuasion, and not the same as the police, with such a rude way to intimidate the child." Ellington said angrily, "They should put their energy In other places, rather than this waste of taxpayers money. "
